description: The Microsoft Band SDK Preview gives developers access to the sensors available on the band, as well as the ability to create and send notifications to tiles. Enhance and extend the experience of your applications to your customers' wrists. More at http://developer.microsoftband.com/.
releaseNotes:
Microsoft Band SDK Preview for Windows Phone - 1.3.10219
Provides real-time access to sensor data from Microsoft Band
Allows creating Tiles on a Microsoft Band, and sending notifications to them
Allows changing the Theme for the Band
Allows changing the main tile background image
summary: The Microsoft Band SDK Preview gives developers access to the sensors available on the band, as well as the ability to create and send notifications to tiles. Enhance and extend the experience of your applications to your customers' wrists.
title: Microsoft Band SDK
